sen.j: おからは日本、中華人民共和国、大韓民国など、東アジア特有の食品の一種。
sen.e: Okara is one of the peculiar foods of East Asia such as Japan, People's Republic of China and Republic of Korea.
Okara is one of the peculiar foods of East Asia such as Japan, People's Republic of China and Republic of Korea.
Okara is a food peculiar to countries in East Asia, such as Japan, the People's Republic of China, and the Republic of Korea.

sen.j: 豆腐を製造する過程で、大豆から豆乳を絞った後に残ったもの。
sen.e: It is soybeans residue which is taken after soymilk is extracted in the manufacturing process of tofu (bean curd).
It is soybeans residue which is taken after soymilk is extracted in the manufacturing process of tofu (bean curd).
It is soybeans residue which is taken after soymilk is extracted in the manufacturing process of tofu (bean curd).

sen.j: 食物繊維を多く含み、火を通して食べることが多い。
sen.e: It contains much fiber and is often eaten after cooking.
It contains much fiber and is often eaten after cooking.
It contains much fiber and is often eaten after cooking.

sen.j: 「おから」は絞りかすの意で茶殻の「がら」などと同源の「から」に丁寧語の「御」をつけたもので、女房言葉のひとつ。
sen.e: The word "okara" means residue, this word consists of a polite language, 'o' and 'kara' which is a paronym of 'gara' in chagara (tea dregs) and it is one of a lady's language.
The word 'okara' means residue, this word consists of a polite language, 'o' and 'kara' which is a paronym of 'gara' in chagara (tea dregs) and it is one of a lady's language.
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更NC_Check
sen.e: The word 'okara', which literally means refuse, consists of the honorific 'o' and the word 'kara' (which is a paronym of 'gara,' as in chagara, meaning tea dregs), and this word was typically used by court ladies.
sen.cmt: Residue→refuseThe word 'okara' means residue,→The word 'okara', which litterally means refuse,a polite language, 'o'→honorific 'o' in→as in

sen.j: 「から」が空に通じるとして、縁起を担いで、白いことからウツギ（うのはな、主に関東地方）、包丁を使わず切らずに食べられるところから雪花菜（きらず、主に近畿地方）などと言いかえることもある。
sen.e: Since the word "kara" has a meaning of emptiness, sometimes it is restated for good luck as "utsugi" (or unohana meaning deutzia, mainly used in Kanto region) because of its whiteness or "kirazu" (written as 雪花菜, mainly used in Kinki region) because it is edible without cutting.

Since the word 'kara' has a meaning of emptiness, sometimes it is restated for good luck as 'utsugi' (or unohana meaning deutzia, mainly used in Kanto region) because of its whiteness or 'kirazu' (written as 雪花菜, mainly used in Kinki region) because it is edible without cutting.
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更
sen.e: Since the word 'kara' has a meaning of emptiness, sometimes it is restated for good luck as 'utsugi' (or unohana meaning deutzia, mainly used in Kanto region) because of its whiteness or 'kirazu' (written as 雪花菜, mainly used in Kinki region) because it is edible without cutting.

sen.j: 「おから」自体も「雪花菜」の字をあてる。
sen.e: Okara' itself is also written as '雪花菜.'
Okara' itself is also written as '雪花菜.'
Okara' itself is also written as '雪花菜.'

sen.j: 中国語では「」（トウジャ - dòuzhā）または「」（トウフジャ - dòufuzhā）、朝鮮語では「」（ピジ）と呼び、精進料理や家庭料理の材料にする。
sen.e: It is called 'toja' or 'tofuja' in Chinese and it is called 'piji' in Korean and it is used for a vegetarian dish and home cuisine.
It is called 'toja' or 'tofuja' in Chinese and it is called 'piji' in Korean and it is used for a vegetarian dish and home cuisine.
It is called 'toja' or 'tofuja' in Chinese and it is called 'piji' in Korean and it is used for a vegetarian dish and home cuisine.

sen.j: 本来が廃物であるところから、値段はごく安価で庶民的な食品である。
sen.e: It is cheap and popular food because of its origin as a garbage.
It is cheap and popular food because of its origin as a garbage.
It is cheap and popular food because of its origin as a garbage.

sen.j: 場合によっては豆腐屋が無料で分け与えたり、捨てたりすることが、古く江戸時代からあった。
sen.e: In some cases, it has been distributed for free by a tofu seller or discarded since the Edo period.
In some cases, it has been distributed for free by a tofu seller or discarded since the Edo period.
In some cases, it has been distributed for free by a tofu seller or discarded since the Edo period.

sen.j: 現在では食品としての需要が供給を大きく下回り、また品質の劣化が早く日持ちがしないため、家畜の飼料として一部を活用したり脱水して保存性を高めて供給されるほかは、ほとんどが廃棄されている。
sen.e: Currently, most okara is discarded since the demand falls much below the supply and it spoils rapidly, except for a part that is used as feeding stuff or dehydrated to enhance the preservative quality.

Currently, most okara is discarded since the demand falls much below the supply and it spoils rapidly, except for a part that is used as feeding stuff or dehydrated to enhance the preservative quality.

Currently, most okara is discarded since the demand falls much below the supply and it spoils rapidly, except for a part that is used as feeding stuff or dehydrated to enhance the preservative quality.

sen.j: 豆腐を作った後の残渣物だが、栄養的には優れている。
sen.e: Although it is a residue after producing tofu, it is rich in nutrients.
Although it is a residue after producing tofu, it is rich in nutrients.
Although it is a residue after producing tofu, it is rich in nutrients.

sen.j: 一般分析値を見れば、乾物中1キロあたりの粗蛋白質は約26%、粗脂肪は約13%、可溶無窒素物が約33%、粗繊維が約15%と非常に栄養価が高い。
sen.e: According to the general analysis value, one kilogram of dry food contains approximately 26 percent of crude protein, 13 percent of crude fat, 33 percent of nitrogen-free extract and 15 percent of crude fiber and it is rich in nutrients.

According to the general analysis value, one kilogram of dry food contains approximately 26 percent of crude protein, 13 percent of crude fat, 33 percent of nitrogen-free extract and 15 percent of crude fiber and it is rich in nutrients.

According to the general analysis value, one kilogram of dry food contains approximately 26 percent of crude protein, 13 percent of crude fat, 33 percent of nitrogen-free extract and 15 percent of crude fiber and it is rich in nutrients.

sen.j: 通常は水分を約75%から80%含む状態で流通している。
sen.e: Normally, it is distributed in the condition that it contains from about 75 to 80 percent moisture.
Normally, it is distributed in the condition that it contains from about 75 to 80 percent moisture.
Normally, it is distributed in the condition that it contains from about 75 to 80 percent moisture.

sen.j: 含まれている粗脂肪（油分）の約50%は不飽和脂肪酸のリノール酸である。
sen.e: About 50 percent of the contained crude fat (oil) is linoleic acid which is unsaturated fatty acid.
About 50 percent of the contained crude fat (oil) is linoleic acid which is unsaturated fatty acid.
About 50 percent of the contained crude fat (oil) is linoleic acid which is unsaturated fatty acid.

sen.j: また、おからには脳の記憶力を高めるホスファチジルコリン（レシチンとも）が豊富に含まれている。
sen.e: Also, okara is rich in phosphatidylcholine which enhances memory.
Also, okara is rich in phosphatidylcholine (or lecithin) which enhances memory.
sen.cmt: 「（レシチンとも）」を訳出 (参照: 英辞郎 on the WEB)
sen.e: Also, okara is rich in phosphatidylcholine (or lecithin) which enhances memory.

sen.j: 記憶に関連した脳内物質としてアセチルコリンがある。
sen.e: There is a brain chemistry related to memory which is called acetylcholine.
There is a brain chemistry related to memory which is called acetylcholine.
There is a brain chemistry related to memory which is called acetylcholine.

sen.j: アセチルコリンを作るにはコリンという物質が欠かせない。
sen.e: A material called choline is essential for making acetylcholine.
A material called choline is essential for making acetylcholine.
A material called choline is essential for making acetylcholine.

sen.j: その前駆物質がホスファチジルコリンであり、ネズミにコリンを与えたところ、記憶力が良くなったという報告もある。
sen.e: The precursor of choline is phosphatidylcholine and there is a report that when choline is given to mice, their memory improved.
The precursor of choline is phosphatidylcholine and there is a report that when choline is given to mice, their memory improved.
The precursor of choline is phosphatidylcholine and there is a report that when choline is given to mice, their memory improved.

sen.j: 油揚げ、シイタケ、ニンジンなどといっしょに出汁で甘めに煮付けるのがもっとも一般的な調理法。
sen.e: The most general recipe is boiling okara with in abura-age (deep-fried bean curd), shiitake mushroom and carrot in a sweetened soup stock.
The most general recipe is boiling okara with in abura-age (deep-fried bean curd), shiitake mushroom and carrot in a sweetened soup stock.
The most general recipe is boiling okara with in abura-age (deep-fried bean curd), shiitake mushroom and carrot in a sweetened soup stock.

sen.j: 炒り卯の花、または単に卯の花と呼ばれることが多い。
sen.e: It is often called fried unohana (other name of okara) or just unohana.
It is often called fried unohana (other name of okara) or just unohana.
It is often called fried unohana (other name of okara) or just unohana.

sen.j: おから自体の甘みと相俟って独特の風味がある。
sen.e: It has a distinct flavor coupled with the sweetness of okara.
It has a distinct flavor coupled with the sweetness of okara.
It has a distinct flavor coupled with the sweetness of okara.

sen.j: 煮魚などの残った出汁を再利用しても風味良く仕上がる。
sen.e: The leftover soup stock of boiled with makes a pleasant addition to it.
The leftover soup stock of boiled fish etc. makes a pleasant addition to it.
sen.cmt: 「煮魚などの」→訳漏れのため訳出、一部訳文修正NC_Check
sen.e: The leftover soup stock of boiled fish, etc., can be reused to give it a pleasing flavor.
sen.cmt: 「利用することもできる」という意味を出しました。

sen.j: 豆腐ハンバーグのように、揚げ物や肉詰めなどの料理に、肉の代りとして用いることもある。
sen.e: Sometimes okara is used as meat substitute for the deep-fried food and meat stuffed recipe such as tofu hamburger..
Sometimes okara is used as meat substitute for the deep-fried food and meat stuffed recipe such as tofu hamburger.
Sometimes okara is used as meat substitute for the deep-fried food and meat stuffed recipe such as tofu hamburger.

sen.j: 水分をよく切るのがコツ。
sen.e: The secret of cooking okara is draining it well.
The secret of cooking okara is draining it well.
The secret of cooking okara is draining it well.

sen.j: カロリーをおさえる効果がある。
sen.e: It is good for decreasing calories.
It is good for decreasing calories.
It is good for decreasing calories.

sen.j: 石川県金沢市では、背から切れ目を入れた鯛におからを詰め、蒸した鯛を2匹腹合わせに盛りつけた鯛の唐蒸しという料理が結婚披露宴で振る舞われる。
sen.e: In Kanazawa City, Ishikawa Prefecture, a dish called Tai no Karamushi (Chinese style steamed sea bream) which is cooked by stuffing okara into a sea bream cut on the back and steaming it, then putting two of them stomach to stomach is served at a wedding party.

In Kanazawa City, Ishikawa Prefecture, a dish called Tai no Karamushi (Chinese style steamed sea bream) which is cooked by stuffing okara into a sea bream cut on the back and steaming it, then putting two of them stomach to stomach is served at a wedding party.

In Kanazawa City, Ishikawa Prefecture, there is a dish called Tai no Karamushi (Chinese-style steamed sea bream), which is prepared by stuffing two sea bream with okara through a cut in their backs and then steaming them, after which they are served on a plate with their stomachs facing each other at a wedding party.
sen.cmt: 「鯛におからを詰める」、２匹腹合わせに盛りつけた」を変更しました。

sen.j: 高知県中部には、鯛の腹におからを詰め、蒸し物にする独特の郷土料理がある。
sen.e: In the central region of Kochi Prefecture, there is a unique local dish which is cooked by stuffing okara into the stomach of a sea bream and steaming it.
In the central region of Kochi Prefecture, there is a unique local dish which is cooked by stuffing okara into the stomach of a sea bream and steaming it.
In the central region of Kochi Prefecture, there is a unique local dish which is cooked by stuffing okara into the stomach of a sea bream and steaming it.

sen.j: 鯛の滋味がおからにうつり、風趣はなはだよい。
sen.e: Okara absorbs the flavor of sea bream and it is rich in taste.
Okara absorbs the flavor of sea bream and it is rich in taste.
Okara absorbs the flavor of sea bream and it is rich in taste.

sen.j: 大分県臼杵ではきらすまめしという郷土料理がある。
sen.e: In Usuki, Oita Prefecture, there is a local dish called kirasumameshi (okara mixed with marinated fish).
In Usuki, Oita Prefecture, there is a local dish called kirasumameshi (okara mixed with marinated fish).

sen.j: 近年は食物繊維が豊富な食材として、ケーキやビスケットなどにも利用されている。
sen.e: In recent years, it is used as an ingredient which is rich in fiber to make cakes and biscuits.
In recent years, it is used as an ingredient which is rich in fiber to make cakes and biscuits.
In recent years, it is used as an ingredient which is rich in fiber to make cakes and biscuits.

sen.j: こんにゃくの粉末と混ぜ合わせて成形した「おからこんにゃく」が肉の代用となる健康食材として、2006年頃から注目を集めている。
sen.e: Okara konjac' which is made by mixing okara with konjac powder and molding has attracted attention as a healthy food that can be a meat substitute since around 2006.
Okara konjac' which is made by mixing okara with konjac powder and molding has attracted attention as a healthy food that can be a meat substitute since around 2006.
Okara konjac' which is made by mixing okara with konjac powder and molding has attracted attention as a healthy food that can be a meat substitute since around 2006.

sen.j: 卯の花炒
sen.e: Fried unohana
Fried unohana
Fried unohana

sen.j: - 鍋に少量のゴマ油をおとし、火にかけて煮立ったところへ卯の花をいれ、たえず杓子でかきまぜながらよく炒める。
sen.e: Heat a small amount of sesame oil in a skillet and add unohana, then stir it constantly with a wooden ladle.
Heat a small amount of sesame oil in a skillet and add unohana, then stir it constantly with a wooden ladle.
Heat a small amount of sesame oil in a skillet and add unohana, then stir it constantly with a wooden ladle.

sen.j: 別の鍋にねぎ、油揚げ、にんじんなどを適宜に切り、あるいは刻み、煮出汁、醤油、砂糖、酒またはみりんで、甘からに下煮をする。
sen.e: Cut or shred green onion, abura-age (deep-fried bean curd), carrot and so on and cook them salty-sweet in another skillet with a soup stock, soy sauce, sugar and sake/mirin (sweet cooking rice wine).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Cut or shred green onion, abura-age (deep-fried bean curd), carrot and so on and cook them salty-sweet in another skillet with a soup stock, soy sauce, sugar and sake/mirin (sweet cooking rice wine).
Cut or shred green onion, abura-age (deep-fried bean curd), carrot and so on and cook them salty-sweet in another skillet with a soup stock, soy sauce, sugar and sake/mirin (sweet cooking rice wine).

sen.j: いためた卯の花をいれて、なお火にかけながら、よくかき混ぜて炒りあげる。
sen.e: Then, add the fried unohana and continuously stir it well over a heat.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Then, add the fried unohana and continuously stir it well over a heat.
Then, add the fried unohana and continuously stir it well over a heat.

sen.j: アサリのむき身か、焼きハゼ、または焼乾、煮乾の雑魚をみじんに刻んだのを加えるといっそう美味しい。
sen.e: It would be more tasty if split clam, or shredded roasted goby, roasted or boiled small fishes are added.
It would be more tasty if split clam, or shredded roasted goby, roasted or boiled small fishes are added.
It would be more tasty if split clam, or shredded roasted goby, roasted or boiled small fishes are added.

sen.j: 卯の花汁
sen.e: Unohana soup
Unohana soup
Unohana soup

sen.j: - サケ、ブリ、ニシンなどの塩蔵品、とくに頭やアラを利用するのが美味い。
sen.e: It would be delicious if salt cured products such as chum salmon, adult yellowtail and herring, in particular their head and ara (discarded portions of the fish) are used.
It would be delicious if salt cured products such as chum salmon, adult yellowtail and herring, in particular their head and ara (discarded portions of the fish) are used.
It would be delicious if salt cured products such as chum salmon, adult yellowtail and herring, in particular their head and ara (discarded portions of the fish) are used.

sen.j: 鍋にたっぷりの水をいれ、塩魚を適宜に切って最初からいれ、中火にかけて気長に煮出す。
sen.e: Pour plenty of water in a pan and add sliced salt fish from the first, then simmer it over medium heat.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Pour plenty of water in a pan and add sliced salt fish from the first, then simmer it over medium heat.
Pour plenty of water in a pan and add sliced salt fish from the first, then simmer it over medium heat.

sen.j: そこにダイコン、ニンジンを半月形またはイチョウ形に薄く切ったものと、コンニャクを適宜むしり込み、油揚げを刻んで加え、煮えたころ、ねぎの五分切りをいれ、卯の花をどろどろになるくらい加える。
sen.e: Slice daikon (Japanese radish) and carrot in the shape of half-moon or ginkgo biloba, tear konjac and shred abura-age, then add them into the pan, when it is cooked, cut green onion into 5 bu (about 1.5cm) length and add it together with unohana until it becomes thick.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Slice daikon (Japanese radish) and carrot in the shape of half-moon or ginkgo biloba, tear konjac and shred abura-age, then add them into the pan, when it is cooked, cut green onion into 5 bu (about 1.5cm) length and add it together with unohana until it becomes thick.

Slice daikon (Japanese radish) and carrot in the shape of half-moon or ginkgo biloba, tear konjac and shred abura-age, then add them into the pan, when it is cooked, cut green onion into 5 bu (about 1.5cm) length and add it together with unohana until it becomes thick.

sen.j: 魚の塩味だけで薄いならば、食塩をくわえ、また適宜酒を加える。
sen.e: If it is bland with the saltiness of fish, add salt and sake if necessary.
If it is bland with the saltiness of fish, add salt and sake if necessary.

sen.j: 味噌を加えることもある。
sen.e: In some cases, miso is used.
In some cases, miso is used.
In some cases, miso is used.

sen.j: 薬味には青のり、こしょう、七味蕃椒など。
sen.e: For condiments, green laver, pepper, shichimi togarashi (a mixture of red cayenne pepper and other aromatic spices) are used.
For condiments, green laver, pepper, shichimi togarashi (a mixture of red cayenne pepper and other aromatic spices) are used.

sen.j: 卯の花鮨
sen.e: Unohana-zushi (sushi made with okara instead of rice)
Unohana-zushi (sushi made with okara instead of rice)
Unohana-zushi (sushi made with okara instead of rice)

sen.j: - 卯の花を煮出汁、みりん、塩で調味し、鶏卵の白身を加え、たえずかきまぜながら炒りつけ、少量の酢を合わせてよく冷やす。
sen.e: Season unohana with soup stock, mirin and salt and add egg white, then stir-fry constantly until it is cooked and finally add a small amount of vinegar and let it cool.
Season unohana with soup stock, mirin and salt and add egg white, then stir-fry constantly until it is cooked and finally add a small amount of vinegar and let it cool.
Season unohana with soup stock, mirin and salt and add egg white, then stir-fry constantly until it is cooked and finally add a small amount of vinegar and let it cool.

sen.j: 別にイワシ、小あじ、コハダなどを普通のすしだねのようにつくり、塩をふりかけて酢につけ、肉が白くはぜるころ引き上げて酢をきる。
sen.e: Aside from this, prepare sardine, horse mackerel and spotted shad as regular sushi item and sprinkle salt o and soak them in vinegar until they are whitened, then drain off the vinegar.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Aside from this, prepare sardine, horse mackerel and spotted shad as regular sushi item and sprinkle salt on them and soak them in vinegar until they are whitened, then drain off the vinegar.
Aside from this, prepare sardine, horse mackerel and spotted shad as regular sushi item and sprinkle salt on them and soak them in vinegar until they are whitened, then drain off the vinegar.

sen.j: 卯の花を普通の握り鮨のように握り、上に酢魚をつけ、刻みしょうがなどをそえる。
sen.e: Make unohana into the shape of normal sushi and put the pickled fish and add chopped ginger and so on.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Make unohana into the shape of normal sushi and put the pickled fish and add chopped ginger and so on.
Make unohana into the shape of normal sushi and put the pickled fish and add chopped ginger and so on.

sen.j: 卯の花膾
sen.e: Unohana namasu (a dish of raw fish and okara seasoned in vinegar)
Unohana namasu (a dish of raw fish and okara seasoned in vinegar)
Unohana namasu (a dish of raw fish and okara seasoned in vinegar)

sen.j: - タイ,サワラ,ヒラメ,スズキ,アジ,サバなど好みの魚を刺身ほどに切ってかぶるくらいの酢につけ,塩を少々くわえ,はぜて白くなったら引き上げ,残り酢を酒または味醂,砂糖などで調味する。
sen.e: Slice desired fish such as sea bream, Japanese spanish mackerel, flatfish, Japanese seaperch, horse mackerel and mackerel into pierced fish-size pieces, soak them in enough vinegar to cover and add a bit of salt, when they are whitened, pull them out and season the left vinegar with sake/mirin and sugar.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Slice desired fish such as sea bream, Japanese spanish mackerel, flatfish, Japanese seaperch, horse mackerel and mackerel into about the size of sashimi (slices of raw fish) pieces, soak them in enough vinegar to cover and add a bit of salt, when they are whitened, pull them out and season the left vinegar with sake/mirin and sugar.
sen.cmt: pierced fish-size→about the size of sashimi (slices of raw fish) としました。
sen.e: Slice desired fish such as sea bream, Japanese spanish mackerel, flatfish, Japanese seaperch, horse mackerel and mackerel into about the size of sashimi (slices of raw fish) pieces, soak them in enough vinegar to cover and add a bit of salt, when they are whitened, pull them out and season the left vinegar with sake/mirin and sugar.

sen.j: 卯の花はまずからいりして水分をのぞき、塩、砂糖で下味をつけ、火から下ろしてよく冷やしたところへ調味酢をあわせ、魚をその中にしのばせる。
sen.e: Dry-fry unohana to get rid of water and season it with salt and sugar, then remove it from the feat and let it cool, finally add seasoned vinegar and the fish.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Dry-fry unohana to get rid of water and season it with salt and sugar, then remove it from the heat and let it cool, finally add seasoned vinegar and the fish.
Dry-fry unohana to get rid of water and season it with salt and sugar, then remove it from the heat and let it cool, finally add seasoned vinegar and the fish.

sen.j: アサの実を炒ってまぜると、香ばしい。
sen.e: It becomes spicy if fried hempseed is added.
It becomes spicy if fried hempseed is added.
It becomes spicy if fried hempseed is added.

sen.j: 小鉢にもって刻み生姜をのせる。
sen.e: Serve them on a small bowl and put chopped ginger on it.
Serve them on a small bowl and put chopped ginger on it.
Serve them on a small bowl and put chopped ginger on it.

sen.j: 卯の花飯
sen.e: Unohana rice
Unohana rice
Unohana rice

sen.j: - 卯の花を煮出汁、酒、砂糖、塩などで好みの味に炒り、酢をくわえてご飯のうえにのせ、刻み生姜をそえる。
sen.e: Stir-fry unohana with desired seasoning such as soup stock, sake, sugar and salt and add vinegar, then put it on rice with chopped ginger.
Stir-fry unohana with desired seasoning such as soup stock, sake, sugar and salt and add vinegar, then put it on rice with chopped ginger.
Stir-fry unohana with desired seasoning such as soup stock, sake, sugar and salt and add vinegar, then put it on rice with chopped ginger.

sen.j: 炒り卵、炒麻の実などをまぜればいっそう美味しい。
sen.e: It becomes more tasty If scrambled egg or fried hempseed is added.
It becomes more tasty If scrambled egg or fried hempseed is added.
It becomes more tasty If scrambled egg or fried hempseed is added.

sen.j: 通常、おからは産業廃棄物として処理される。
sen.e: Usually, okara is disposed as industrial waste.
Usually, okara is disposed as industrial waste.
Usually, okara is disposed as industrial waste.

sen.j: 全国民が少量ずつ毎日食べれば廃棄物にならないとも言われるが、現状では上記の理由などから多くが廃棄物となってしまう。
sen.e: It is said that if whole nation eats small amount of okara everyday, it will not become waste product, but most okara become waste product for the above reason now.
It is said that if whole nation eats small amount of okara everyday, it will not become waste product, but most okara become waste product for the above reason now.
It is said that if whole nation eats small amount of okara everyday, it will not become waste product, but most okara become waste product for the above reason now.

sen.j: これに対し、おからの再利用については様々な研究がなされている。
sen.e: Thus, various studies on the reuse of okara are conducted.
Thus, various studies on the reuse of okara are conducted.
Thus, various studies on the reuse of okara are conducted.

sen.j: 静岡油化工業株式会社は、2008年3月からおからを原料にしたバイオエタノールの製造を開始する。
sen.e: Sizuoka Yuka Kougyou Co.,Ltd. starts manufacturing bioethanol made with okara in March, 2008.
sen.cmt: 静岡と工業は"Shizuoka"、"Kogyo"とすべきですが、会社のHPに従って左記の訳語を採用しました。
sen.e: Sizuoka Yuka Kougyou Co.,Ltd. starts manufacturing bioethanol made with okara in March, 2008.
Sizuoka Yuka Kougyou Co.,Ltd. starts manufacturing bioethanol made with okara in March, 2008.

sen.j: 現在産業廃棄物として処理されているおからのバイオ燃料への再利用技術は、原油価格が高騰している昨今の社会背景の中、注目される。
sen.e: The reuse technology of okara which is disposed as industrial waste now for biofuel attracts attention in this social condition where oil prices is soaring.
The reuse technology of okara which is disposed as industrial waste now for biofuel attracts attention in this social condition where oil prices are soaring.
sen.cmt: oil prices is→oil prices areに修正
sen.e: The reuse technology of okara which is disposed as industrial waste now for biofuel attracts attention in this social condition where oil prices are soaring.

sen.j: また、大手タイル・便所メーカーのINAXは、おから乾燥機「オカラット」を使用した再生技術を開発した。
sen.e: Leading tile and lavatory manufacturer, INAX has developed a reuse technology using an okara dryer called "Okarat."
Leading tile and lavatory manufacturer, INAX has developed a reuse technology using an okara dryer called 'Okarat.'
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更
sen.e: Leading tile and lavatory manufacturer, INAX has developed a reuse technology using an okara dryer called 'Okarat.'

sen.j: おからを瞬時に乾燥させることで、日持ちのする飼料として販売することができるようにした。
sen.e: It makes okara into long-life feeding stuffby drying it instantly.
It makes okara into long-life feeding stuffby drying it instantly.
It makes okara into long-life feeding stuffby drying it instantly.

sen.j: 既に15台以上の「オカラット」を納入している。
sen.e: More than 15 "Okarat" has already been delivered.
More than 15 'Okarat' has already been delivered.
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更
sen.e: More than 15 'Okarat' has already been delivered.

sen.j: 他にも、成分を取り出して基礎化粧品の開発に成功した例、乾燥おからを使った猫砂などの実用例もある。
sen.e: In addition, there are a successful examplesof developing a basic skin care using an extract of okara and practical use of dried okara as sand for pet cat.
In addition, there are successful examplesof developing a basic skin care using an extract of okara and practical use of dried okara as sand for pet cat.
In addition, there are successful examplesof developing a basic skin care using an extract of okara and practical use of dried okara as sand for pet cat.

sen.j: 荻生徂徠が若いころ、貧のあまりに近くの豆腐屋からおからを分けてもらい、飢えをしのいだといわれる。
sen.e: It is said that when Sorai OGYU was young, he was so poor that he kept hunger away with okara which was given by a neighborhood tofu store.
It is said that when Sorai OGYU was young, he was so poor that he kept hunger away with okara which was given by a neighborhood tofu store.
It is said that when Sorai OGYU was young, he was so poor that he kept hunger away with okara which was given by a neighborhood tofu store.

sen.j: 講談の有名なタネのひとつである。
sen.e: This is one of the most famous story of kodan storytelling.
This is one of the most famous stories of kodan storytelling.
This is one of the most famous stories of kodan storytelling.

sen.j: 落語の「千早振る」には、おちぶれて乞食となった遊女千早が豆腐屋になった竜田川におからを乞うて拒絶される場面が出てくる。
sen.e: In a story of rakugo (traditional comic storytelling) called 'Chihayaburu', there is a scene where a prostitute Chihaya who went down and became a beggar asks Tatsutagawa who became a tofu seller for okara and is rejected.

In a story of rakugo (traditional comic storytelling) called 'Chihayaburu,' there is a scene where a prostitute Chihaya who went down and became a beggar asks Tatsutagawa who became a tofu seller for okara and is rejected.

In a story of rakugo (traditional comic storytelling) called 'Chihayaburu,' there is a scene where a prostitute Chihaya who went down and became a beggar asks Tatsutagawa who became a tofu seller for okara and is rejected.

sen.j: 同じく落語「鹿政談」では、豆腐屋が軒先に出しておいたおからを飢えたシカが食べてしまうところから話がはじまる。
sen.e: Also a story of rakugo called 'Shikaseidan' begins at the scene where a starving deer eats okara which was placed along the eaves by a tofu seller.
Also a story of rakugo called 'Shikaseidan' begins at the scene where a starving deer eats okara which was placed along the eaves by a tofu seller.
Also a story of rakugo called 'Shikaseidan' begins at the scene where a starving deer eats okara which was placed along the eaves by a tofu seller.

sen.j: 「千早振る」とあわせて、おからがほとんど廃物同然だったことがわかる。
sen.e: Together with 'Chihayaburu', it shows the fact that okara was rubbishy.
Together with 'Chihayaburu,' it shows the fact that okara was rubbishy.
Together with 'Chihayaburu,' it shows the fact that okara was rubbishy.

sen.j: うな重の起源はウナギの蒲焼が冷めないよう、熱したおからを敷いた重箱に鰻を乗せて出前したことにはじまるという説がある。
sen.e: There is a theory that unaju (grilled eel over rice) originated from a delivery food which uses jubako (tiered food boxes) filled with heated okara to put broiled eel on it and keep that warm.
There is a theory that unaju (grilled eel over rice) originated from a delivery food which used jubako (tiered food boxes) filled with heated okara to put broiled eel on it and keep that warm.
There is a theory that unaju (grilled eel over rice) originated from a delivery food which used jubako (tiered food boxes) filled with heated okara to put broiled eel on it and keep that warm.

sen.j: 能舞台や所作板はすべりをよくし、つやを出すためにおからで乾拭きをする。
sen.e: Okara is used for polishing Noh stage and Shosa-ita (board for shosa (the steps and movements of Kabuki and Noh actors)) with a dry cloth to make them smooth and glossy.
Okara is used for polishing Noh stage and Shosa-ita (board for shosa (the steps and movements of Kabuki and Noh actors)) with a dry cloth to make them smooth and glossy.
Okara is used for polishing Noh stage and Shosa-ita (board for shosa (the steps and movements of Kabuki and Noh actors)) with a dry cloth to make them smooth and glossy.

sen.j: 中国語では、粗悪なセメントを使った強度不足の工事を「おから工事」を意味する「豆腐渣工程」（トウフジャーコンチョン）と表現する。
sen.e: In Chinese, a construction work which uses inferior cement and lacks strength is called 'tofuja konchon' meaning 'a construction work using okara.'
In Chinese, a construction work which uses inferior cement and lacks strength is called 'tofuja konchon' meaning 'a construction work using okara.'
In Chinese, a construction work which uses inferior cement and lacks strength is called 'tofuja konchon' meaning 'a construction work using okara.'

sen.j: 2008年に起きた四川大地震でも、影響が顕著に現れた。
sen.e: The Great Sichuan Earthquake of 2008 showed a significant impact of that.
The Great Sichuan Earthquake of 2008 showed a significant impact of that.
The Great Sichuan Earthquake of 2008 showed a significant impact of that.

sen.j: 2004年6月20日に鳥取県智頭町で行われた町議会議員の補欠選挙で、「オカラ」と書かれた票が投じられ、無効票扱いとなった。
sen.e: In the by-election for town councilor held in Chizu-cho Town, Tottori Prefecture on June 20, 2004, a ballot saying 'okara' was casted and it was counted as invalid.
In the by-election for town councilor held in Chizu-cho, Tottori Prefecture on June 20, 2004, a ballot saying 'okara' was casted and it was counted as invalid.
In the by-election for town councilor held in Chizu-cho, Tottori Prefecture on June 20, 2004, a ballot saying 'okara' was casted and it was counted as invalid.

sen.j: これに対して最下位当選者に1票差で落選した候補者が「自分の苗字（オカダ）の書き間違いだ」として同町の選挙管理委員会に異議を申し立てた。
sen.e: In response to this, a candidate who lost by on vote said, "It was a misspelling of my family name (Okada)" and filed a claim to the local election administration commission.
In response to this, a candidate who lost by one vote said, 'It was a misspelling of my family name (Okada)' and filed a claim to the local election administration commission.
sen.cmt: lost by on vote→lost by one voteに修正、シングルクォーテーションに変更
sen.e: In response to this, a candidate who lost by one vote said, 'It was a misspelling of my family name (Okada)' and filed a claim to the local election administration commission.

sen.j: これが有効とされ最下位当選者の当選が無効となったため、今度はこの候補者が「自分がおからを牛に飼料として与えていることは町内では周知であり、この票は自分のことを指している」として県の選挙管理委員会に異議を申し立てた。
sen.e: The allegation was regarded as valid and the last elected person was deprived of its elected post, then this candidate said, "The whole town knows the fact that I feed okara to cow and the ballot is casted for me" and filed a claim to the prefectural election administration commission.

The allegation was regarded as valid and the last elected person was deprived of its elected post, then this candidate said, 'The whole town knows the fact that I feed okara to cow and the ballot is casted for me' and filed a claim to the prefectural election administration commission.
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更
sen.e: The allegation was regarded as valid and the last elected person was deprived of its elected post, then this candidate said, 'The whole town knows the fact that I feed okara to cow and the ballot is casted for me' and filed a claim to the prefectural election administration commission.

sen.j: 県選管はいずれの候補に投じられた票ともせず、無効票とする裁定を下した。
sen.e: The prefectural election administration commission ruled that the ballot was casted for neither candidate and counted it as invalid.
The prefectural election administration commission ruled that the ballot was casted for neither candidate and counted it as invalid.
The prefectural election administration commission ruled that the ballot was casted for neither candidate and counted it as invalid.

sen.j: 近衛十四郎主演の時代劇『素浪人 花山大吉』にて、近衛演じる主人公、花山大吉の大好物としておからが登場する。
sen.e: In a period drama called "Master-less samurai (Suronin), Daikichi HANAYAMA" starring Jushiro KONOE, okara appears as a favorite food of the main character, Daikichi HANAYAMA played by Konoe.
In a period drama called "Master-Less Samurai (Suronin), Daikichi HANAYAMA" starring Jushiro KONOE, okara appears as a favorite food of the main character, Daikichi HANAYAMA played by Konoe.
sen.cmt: 余分なスペース削除、クォーテーション内の単語の頭文字を大文字に変更
sen.e: In a period drama called "Master-Less Samurai (Suronin), Daikichi HANAYAMA" starring Jushiro KONOE, okara appears as a favorite food of the main character, Daikichi HANAYAMA played by Konoe.

sen.j: 作中で花山大吉はおからを酒の肴として病的なほどに食しており、68人前のおからを平らげたこともあった。
sen.e: In this drama, Daikichi HANAYAMA unwholesomelyeats okara as appetizer and once he ate up okara for 68 people.
In this drama, Daikichi HANAYAMA unwholesomelyeats okara as appetizer and once he ate up okara for 68 people.
